Uses of Interface
eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.core.Pool

  • Packages that use Pool 
    Package Description
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.core
    Contains the API core classes and interfaces which are somewhat independent.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.ds
    Contains the ADVANCE datastore API record classes and interfaces.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl
    Default implementations of the Flow Engine API with local and remote options.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm
    Communication classes through various means: JDBC, JMS, SOAP, FTP, HTTP, etc.
